updateImageDesc1: You can update your application's Docker image to offer an up-to-date version of your service. Updates are incremental, and will not result in any service disruptions. Your current configuration will also be retained, such as your HTTP endpoint and deployment strategy.
updateImageDesc2: Please provide a different tag so that the Docker image update is taken into account.
imageInfo: Enter the path to your Docker image. Images hosted on a private or public registry are accepted (GitHub, GitLab, DockerHub, etc.)
